list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: for the purpose of; in the interest of; in order to achieve or preserve.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the couple moved to the coast for the sake of her health
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cặp vợ chồng chuyển đến bờ biển vì sức khỏe của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: out of consideration for or in order to help someone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have to make an effort for John's sake
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi phải nỗ lực vì lợi ích của John

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to express impatience, annoyance, urgency, or desperation.
a Japanese alcoholic drink made from fermented rice, traditionally drunk warm in small porcelain cups.
